formula.name: Single KPI
formula.text: AVG(CALC_THROUGHPUT(ALL_OCCURRENCE['Sende Bestellung'] TO ALL_OCCURRENCE['Process End'], REMAP_TIMESTAMPS("_CEL_P2P_ACTIVITIES"."EVENTTIME", DAYS, MONDAY 06:00 - 19:00 TUESDAY 06:00 - 19:00 WEDNESDAY 06:00 - 19:00 THURSDAY 06:00 - 20:00 FRIDAY 06:00 - 19:00)))
